channel.title: Brogan Sessions
channel.description:
Chirs Brogan has been setting the Electro & Progressive house seen atwitter with a rampant start to his DJ career, seeing him skyrocket at an amazing pace from obscurity to international stardom
From Fabric where Chris started his journey to play in many of the well known clubs to warehouse parties across London. Moving quickly Chris spread his sound of progressive house to some of the clubs across the continent of Europe like France, Belgium, Denmark, Greece & Germany and Sweden and internationally in Brazil and Mexico.
In addition to DJing, one of Chris’s passion is to be able to work on his own production of music which give him chance to showcase his creativity on the dance floor in more ways than one on what he is capable of doing in the future.
My Podcast Alley feed! {pca-1ddfa38baf76c6840892fb7dbc2827f8}
Podcast Directory
channel.itunes:subtitle: Do your ears a favour

item.title: OFF WITH THEIR HEADS!!!
item.description: ARE YOU READY? ARE YOU READY FOR THIS??? Welcome to my june podcast/promo mix/bit of fun. It's been a while since my last mix, apologies for the delay. I wanted to make one that was FUN! It's a blend of summer tweaks, disco flicks, dirty beats and trancy chic! As it's the Jubilee Celebrations weekend I thought I'd use a quote from another "famous" Queen: OFF WITH THEIR HEADS!!! All tracks carefully selected for a summer feel so you can enjoy the Jubilee weekend (hopefully in the sun!) Track listing available on request. Quick thanks to: Mark Rader (fab party!) - Michael & Rob - Munty Towers - WOW - Tim @ Tonker and all the Soho Gyms Crew for the Hed Kandi Clapham nights!
item.dc:creator: Chris Brogan
item.itunes:summary:
ARE YOU READY? ARE YOU READY FOR THIS???
Welcome to my june podcast/promo mix/bit of fun.
It's been a while since my last mix, apologies for the delay. I wanted to make one that was FUN! It's a blend of summer tweaks, disco flicks, dirty beats and trancy chic!
As it's the Jubilee Celebrations weekend I thought I'd use a quote from another "famous" Queen:
OFF WITH THEIR HEADS!!!
All tracks carefully selected for a summer feel so you can enjoy the Jubilee weekend (hopefully in the sun!)
Track listing available on request.
Quick thanks to:
Mark Rader (fab party!) - Michael & Rob - Munty Towers - WOW - Tim @ Tonker and all the Soho Gyms Crew for the Hed Kandi Clapham nights!

item.title: BabyCakes 4.0
item.description: Welcome to my first mix of this Olympic year. We have a few vintage divas on this one. Opening with Lulu... YES LULU!! I've also included my exclusive Madonna bootleg and a great new take on Tina Arena! All blended with some exclusive edits, great disco, dash of house and a sprinkle of 80s. Big shout outs to all the crew at WOW Cardiff, Jamie H thank you so much for the opportunity! To the Hubby, Michael Zreika and Rob Molloy (fab power couple!) and to Herr Doktor. He finally found the info bit of my podcasts ;-) A very happy birthday to Gary! Finally... Some news for your all... BabyCakes will be launched as a club night in Cardiff very soon in hopes to bring it to London! I'll be posting some more news on my facebook page very soon!
item.dc:creator: Chris Brogan
item.itunes:summary:
Welcome to my first mix of this Olympic year.
We have a few vintage divas on this one. Opening with Lulu... YES LULU!! I've also included my exclusive Madonna bootleg and a great new take on Tina Arena!
All blended with some exclusive edits, great disco, dash of house and a sprinkle of 80s.
Big shout outs to all the crew at WOW Cardiff, Jamie H thank you so much for the opportunity! To the Hubby, Michael Zreika and Rob Molloy (fab power couple!) and to Herr Doktor. He finally found the info bit of my podcasts ;-)
A very happy birthday to Gary!
Finally... Some news for your all... BabyCakes will be launched as a club night in Cardiff very soon in hopes to bring it to London! I'll be posting some more news on my facebook page very soon!

item.title: TemperMental
item.description: Welcome to Temper/Mental This is a celebratory podcast after reaching number 1 on Juno download and not far behind on DJDownload with my first release: TEMPER As you know I've selfishly promoting it with SorryShoes Records and am so pleased it's been recognised by the great producers and DJs out there. I can tell you my next release "Green Means Go" will be up and ready very soon. If you need the playlist drop me a line but please show your support and purchase Temper which is featured here: http://www.junodownload.com/artists/Chris+Brogan/tracks/ And here's the shootouts: to all the people who never believed in me or those who thought I wasn't worth it. Your rejection became my motivation… To Jed, thank you for continuing to be my muse. To Jo, keep smiling, this one's for both of you! Oh and to you, yes YOU!!! Thank you for downloading, playing, posting, reposting, following and facebooking me. I'm blessed to be doing something that means a lot to and your support is as always very valued.
item.dc:creator: Chris Brogan
item.itunes:summary:
Welcome to Temper/Mental
This is a celebratory podcast after reaching number 1 on Juno download and not far behind on DJDownload with my first release: TEMPER
As you know I've selfishly promoting it with SorryShoes Records and am so pleased it's been recognised by the great producers and DJs out there. I can tell you my next release "Green Means Go" will be up and ready very soon.
If you need the playlist drop me a line but please show your support and purchase Temper which is featured here:
http://www.junodownload.com/artists/Chris+Brogan/tracks/
And here's the shootouts: to all the people who never believed in me or those who thought I wasn't worth it. Your rejection became my motivation…
To Jed, thank you for continuing to be my muse. To Jo, keep smiling, this one's for both of you!
Oh and to you, yes YOU!!! Thank you for downloading, playing, posting, reposting, following and facebooking me. I'm blessed to be doing something that means a lot to and your support is as always very valued.

item.title: RISE UP!!
item.description: Welcome to September's mix RISE UP! Life aint that bad, it's what YOU make of it! Uplifting tracks with a thump. From bigroom, big vocals to minimalistic classics... there's something for everyone. This mix has brought a very big smile to my face, hope has the same affect on you. Once again, thank you so much for downloading and listening. It's thanks to you I'm doing something that means a lot to me. Music changed my life! Sugar Freak - Music Change My Life feat. Diva (Lys Vocal Mix) Richard Dinsdale, Sam Obernik & Hook N Sling - Edge Of The Earth PenMario Ochoa - 1999 (Original Dub Mix) Serge Devant feat. Taleen - 3AM Eternal (Zoltan Kontes Mix) Jesse Garcia Feat. Corey Andrews - Stormy Weather (Dave Penn mix) Ce Ce Peniston - Finally 2011 (David Puentez Bootleg) Boris Dlugosch feat. Roisin Murphy - Never Enough (Chocolate Skylar Grey Invisible (John Dahlback Remix Axwell - Teenage Crime vs. In The Air vs. Found U Tristan Garner feat. Abigail Bailey - Shine Again (Original Mix) Axwell – Feel The Vibe (Whelan & Di Scala Bootleg) Nadia Ali - Pressure (Alesso Mix) Underworld Diamond Jigsaw (Morgan Page Remix) Cicada - Fast Cars (DBN Remix) Sunkids feat. Chance Rise Up (Grant Nelson's Big Room Mix) Get off of your lazy ass and RISE UP!! Oh and thanks to my ever so patient boyfriend. Jed, thank you for inspiring me yet again.

item.title: BabyCakes 3
item.description: So here goes, after a very successful 2nd serving, we're back again for more!! It's a little longer than the others, thought I'd let you savour it a more. There's tracks for everyone in this...! Even Kylie made it on to the playlist! (Fickle, me? NEVER!) Over the past few months I've had tremendous support from friends and a few I want to thank personally: Matt, Barry, Pete, Nigel, Dr Jones, Jo Hari and all the people who come support me regularly at my gigs... and also Jed, thank you for pushing me to better myself each time! WHO RUN THIS MOTHER?!?!?! Martin Solveig - Rocking Music (Sonny Wharton Bootleg) Truelove - Let's Party (Original Mix) Jorge Montia & Muzikfabrik - Out Of Control (Lauer & Canard Remix) Mike Newman, The Viron - Lady (Crazibiza Remix) Danny Freakazoid - Long Legs Running 2011 (Graham Sahara & Central Avenue Mix) Muzzaik - Work It (David Penn Remix) Electric Tango - Sax Story (Dinos Original Mix) John Dahlback - Are You Nervous (Original Mix) Red Carpet- Alright (My Digital Enemy Bootleg) Full Intention - I'll Be Waiting ft. Shena (Michael Gray & Jon Pearn Remix) Quivver feat. Cari Golden - Happy (Original Mix) Michael Gray ft. Laura Kidd - Piece of You (Alex Kenji Remix) Morgan Page, Sultan & Ned Shepard, BT ft Angela McCluskey - In The Air Andrea Bertolini - Teardrop (Original Mix) Kylie - Aphrodite (Denzal Park Remix) Adamski - Killer 2011 (Hoxton Whores Remix) Armin Van Buuren feat. Nadia Ali - Feels So Good (Jerome Isma-Ae Remix) Beyonce - Run The World (Girls) (Chris Lake Club Mix) Kings Of Tomorrow - Finally (East & Young Remix) Dr Kucho - Belmondo Rulez 2 0 (Original Mix)

item.title: BabyCakes2
item.description: Welcome to your second serving of BabyCakes... It's summery with a twist. Each track carefully selected. Introducing the final edit of Temper at lucky track number 13 You can find me in Cologne for Recon on the 10th June. If you're in town come say hi. Please also check out the fan page, I update if regularly: http://www.facebook.com/ChrisBroganDJ As always your ongoing support is very much appreciated: PLEASE COMMENT/REPOST/SHARE...! TRACK LISTING: 1 - Julian Poker - I Thought It Was You - Original Mix 2 - Alex Kenji - Get Funky 3 - Quicksilver - Peter Gunn Theme (Lissat & Voltaxx Remix) 4 - MYNC - Something On Your Mind Feat Abigail Bailey (Lissat & Voltaxx Dub) 5 - Bob Sinclair - Fuck the Disco 6 - Jesse Rose - Non Stop (Mason mix) 7 - DJ Sandy vs Housetrap - Overdrive 8 - Mike Masters - Give It To Me 9 - Truelove - Rock The Casbah (Original Mix) 10 - Beatthiefs - Pressure 11 - Alex Kenji, Manuel De La Mare - Want 12 - Hoxton Whores - Give Up, Give In 13 - Chris Brogan - Temper (Final Preview Edit) 14 - Mark Knight Vs Florence - You Got The Love 15 - Alex Sayz feat. Nadia Ali - Free To Go (Original Mix) NJOI

item.title: BabyCakes
item.description: babycakes Welcome to BabyCakes the Spring podcast New mix, new sounds, new tracks and new gigs! After storming through Cardiff (WOW/CLUB-X) and Cologne (PANIC ROOM), Rupert St and Hola! I've had a few weekends off to concentrate on getting some new tunes together, some R&R and some cake... Catch me over the next few weeks at Shadow Lounge, Rupert St, Tonker and a couple more to come.. Haji and Emanuel - Weekend (Marco Llys Remix) Chris Lake - Secret In The Dark (Alex Kenji Remix) Dirty Impact Vs. Royal Xtc - Tom's Diner (Lissat & Voltaxx Remix) Erick Morillo & Eddie Thoneick - Live Your Life (Bills & Hurr Mix) DJ PP - Alleluia (Jay Vegas Remix) Stefano Noferini - I Want U (Original Mix) Mark. M, DJ Ortzy feat. Aria - Party In Miami 2011 (Stefano Noferini Remix) Umek and PHNTM - Dead Space (Original Club Mix) F.Physical - Into The Groove (Original Mix) Disco Darlings - To Be Real (Disco Darlings We Are Back Mix) Stardust VS Kid Massive - Music Sounds Better With You Sebjak & Thomas Sagsta, Polarsets - Do All You Want (Original Mix) Ted Nilsson & Gemma Irwin - Hypnotized (Steve Haines Remix) The Beatthiefs - Pressure (Chris Brogan Edit) Sultan & Ned Shepard ft. Nadia Ali - Call My Name (Kaskade Mix) Tiesto & Mark Knight Feat. Dino - Beautiful World (Original Club Mix) Big THANK YOU to Said, Katrina, Pacquo and the Cologne Crew. Thank you for making me feel so welcome and hope to see you all soon! ME-AH-OOOOH!! ;-) To all the staff at WOW and Club-X and also to Nigel, Nathan and Amanda, you ROCK! To Terry Vietheer and Alessandro. Drudi and Hari and Chi. Munty Towers and you know who... Finally to Disco Matt, the scene needs more people like you... thank you... Please checkout his regular scene updates here: www.discomatt.com
item.dc:creator: Chris Brogan

babycakes
Welcome to BabyCakes the Spring podcast
New mix, new sounds, new tracks and new gigs!
After storming through Cardiff (WOW/CLUB-X) and Cologne (PANIC ROOM), Rupert St and Hola! I've had a few weekends off to concentrate on getting some new tunes together, some R&R and some cake...
Catch me over the next few weeks at Shadow Lounge, Rupert St, Tonker and a couple more to come..
Haji and Emanuel - Weekend (Marco Llys Remix) Chris Lake - Secret In The Dark (Alex Kenji Remix) Dirty Impact Vs. Royal Xtc - Tom's Diner (Lissat & Voltaxx Remix) Erick Morillo & Eddie Thoneick - Live Your Life (Bills & Hurr Mix) DJ PP - Alleluia (Jay Vegas Remix) Stefano Noferini - I Want U (Original Mix) Mark. M, DJ Ortzy feat. Aria - Party In Miami 2011 (Stefano Noferini Remix) Umek and PHNTM - Dead Space (Original Club Mix) F.Physical - Into The Groove (Original Mix) Disco Darlings - To Be Real (Disco Darlings We Are Back Mix) Stardust VS Kid Massive - Music Sounds Better With You Sebjak & Thomas Sagsta, Polarsets - Do All You Want (Original Mix) Ted Nilsson & Gemma Irwin - Hypnotized (Steve Haines Remix) The Beatthiefs - Pressure (Chris Brogan Edit) Sultan & Ned Shepard ft. Nadia Ali - Call My Name (Kaskade Mix) Tiesto & Mark Knight Feat. Dino - Beautiful World (Original Club Mix)
Big THANK YOU to
Said, Katrina, Pacquo and the Cologne Crew. Thank you for making me feel so welcome and hope to see you all soon! ME-AH-OOOOH!! ;-)
To all the staff at WOW and Club-X and also to Nigel, Nathan and Amanda, you ROCK!
To Terry Vietheer and Alessandro. Drudi and Hari and Chi. Munty Towers and you know who...
Finally to Disco Matt, the scene needs more people like you... thank you... Please checkout his regular scene updates here: www.discomatt.com

item.title: RESOLUTION
item.description: First podcast of 2011. After such great sets played over December and first few weeks of January I wanted to wait a little before publishing the first chapter for 2011. It's got some tracks which made my 2010 and some that are currently making my 2011. Big shout out to The Dennings for yet another great party. Minty for having me play at Barcode for her birthday (such an amazing woman), Disco Matt for his continuous support and kind words, Alesandro for getting me to play one of my best sets at Rupert St and finally to that someone special who got mentioned a lot last year. Thank you for taking on your role as muse again... Track Listing: Beatthiefs - Heaven Mihalis Safras - Leave Part 2 Robyn - Hang With Me (Kaiserdisco mix) Technotronic - Pump up the Jam Roger Sanchez - 2gether (Chus &Taylor mix) Nalim & Kane - Beachball (Chris Lake mix) Rasmus Faber & Candi Staton - Wilder Side (Pete Tong mix) Digital Enemy - Release My Soul Dr Kucho! - Sanity Bastian - Billie Was Here (Umek mix) LRM & LBX - Liftered DLG vs Angello & Prydz - Here Rock Voices Juanjo Martin Vs K.O.T - Finally Millennium Timo Garcia - Lady Luck City Lights (Lange mix) Manuel De La Mare - Club Around The World TomCraft - A Place Called Soul (De La Mare mix) Martin Solveig - Hello (Michael Woods Vs CHRIS BROGAN edit) Funkagenda Sultan & Shepard - Past Dreaming Daniel Portman - Humanity Jody Wisternoff - Welcome To Your Life (remix) ENJOY!
item.dc:creator: Chris Brogan
item.itunes:summary:
First podcast of 2011.
After such great sets played over December and first few weeks of January I wanted to wait a little before publishing the first chapter for 2011. It's got some tracks which made my 2010 and some that are currently making my 2011.
Big shout out to The Dennings for yet another great party. Minty for having me play at Barcode for her birthday (such an amazing woman), Disco Matt for his continuous support and kind words, Alesandro for getting me to play one of my best sets at Rupert St and finally to that someone special who got mentioned a lot last year. Thank you for taking on your role as muse again...
Track Listing:
Beatthiefs - Heaven Mihalis Safras - Leave Part 2 Robyn - Hang With Me (Kaiserdisco mix) Technotronic - Pump up the Jam Roger Sanchez - 2gether (Chus &Taylor mix) Nalim & Kane - Beachball (Chris Lake mix) Rasmus Faber & Candi Staton - Wilder Side (Pete Tong mix) Digital Enemy - Release My Soul Dr Kucho! - Sanity Bastian - Billie Was Here (Umek mix) LRM & LBX - Liftered DLG vs Angello & Prydz - Here Rock Voices Juanjo Martin Vs K.O.T - Finally Millennium Timo Garcia - Lady Luck City Lights (Lange mix) Manuel De La Mare - Club Around The World TomCraft - A Place Called Soul (De La Mare mix) Martin Solveig - Hello (Michael Woods Vs CHRIS BROGAN edit) Funkagenda Sultan & Shepard - Past Dreaming Daniel Portman - Humanity Jody Wisternoff - Welcome To Your Life (remix)
ENJOY!

item.title: Rebranded
item.description: It's been over a month since the last podcast. A hell of a lot happens in a month! Time to reflect and enjoy new adventures. Rebound? No. Rebrand? YES! I've been very busy on a variety of new projects ranging from working with Electronic Session with their amazing boat party (if you were not there, you serious missed out!), my future gig at Ministry of Sound and finally working with Per Qx on my new track "Temper" which is featured on this podcast (unfinished edit) Stefano Noferini - Somebody to love Ticon - Jinxed (Christian Smith mix) Wolfgang Gartner, Mark Knight - Conscindo Gregor Salso vs Umek - 2nd Mas Que Nada To None Umek - OMGWTF (Original Mix) Chris Brogan - Temper (Unfinished Edit) Axwell - Nothing But Love (TV Rock mix) Lissat & Thomas & Voltaxx - Real Life (Paul Thomas & Russel G Remix) Underworld - Always Loved A Film (Michael Woods mix) Faithless - Sun to me Paul Thomas & Jerome Isma Ae - Tomorrow Whelan & Di Scala - Achilles (OFFBeat Mix) This is a very inspired podcast, a little tougher than before... Once again, thank you for listening. www.djchrisbrogan.co.uk
item.dc:creator: Chris Brogan
item.itunes:summary:
It's been over a month since the last podcast. A hell of a lot happens in a month! Time to reflect and enjoy new adventures. Rebound? No. Rebrand? YES!
I've been very busy on a variety of new projects ranging from working with Electronic Session with their amazing boat party (if you were not there, you serious missed out!), my future gig at Ministry of Sound and finally working with Per Qx on my new track "Temper" which is featured on this podcast (unfinished edit)
Stefano Noferini - Somebody to love Ticon - Jinxed (Christian Smith mix) Wolfgang Gartner, Mark Knight - Conscindo Gregor Salso vs Umek - 2nd Mas Que Nada To None Umek - OMGWTF (Original Mix) Chris Brogan - Temper (Unfinished Edit) Axwell - Nothing But Love (TV Rock mix) Lissat & Thomas & Voltaxx - Real Life (Paul Thomas & Russel G Remix) Underworld - Always Loved A Film (Michael Woods mix) Faithless - Sun to me Paul Thomas & Jerome Isma Ae - Tomorrow Whelan & Di Scala - Achilles (OFFBeat Mix)
This is a very inspired podcast, a little tougher than before...
Once again, thank you for listening.
www.djchrisbrogan.co.uk

item.title: Flow
item.description: Flow is the mental state of operation in which a person in an activity is fully immersed in a feeling of energized focus, full involvement, and success in the process of the activity. Well I know someone who ALWAYS goes with and has the flow... Andrea, thank you from the bottom of my heart for all the kind words, support and extra little pushes over the last year... Your personality, kindness, energy and warmth have been most refreshing and I look forward to many more years of friendship to come. When recalling most of my nights/days out with "La Drudi" the tale always starts with the same sentence: "This one time I went out with Andrea..." Hope you enjoy the mix, this one is ALL FOR YOU!! Professor Green - I Need You Tonight (Gramophonedzie Remix) Muzzaik - Fat Pachy (Belocca & Soneec Dark Dub) D.Ramirez - 8 Bit Trumpit (Original Club Mix) Soneec & Lauer feat. Canard - Sunny (Original Club Mix) Todd Terry - Keep On Jumpin (J Nitti 2010 Remix) Morten Breum & Camille Jones - I Like It (Tocadisco Remix) TV Rock feat. Tara McDonald - Elevated (Original Mix) Diamond Life (Daddy’s Groove Magic Island Rework) Nadia Ali - Fantasy (Morgan Page Remix) Faithless - Feel Me (ATFC's Spit Out The Sedative mix) Dannii Minogue feat. Flower Power - You Won't Forget About Me (EDX's Make People Smile Remix) Thank you all for downloading and listing to the podcast, your ongoing support has and will always be appreciated muchly...

item.title: Terrace
item.description: Right... Summer is nearly done and dusted. Unfortunately I did not spend it by the beaches of the White Isle this year. I plan to next year. I have not been to Ibiza in nearly 3 years, guess an appearance needs to be made. In the meantime I've selected some of the best Space Terrace inspired tracks out there at the moment. Lucky podcast number 13? Well I hope you enjoy this one as much as I do... Chris Ingr-id "Vive Le Swing" (Rivaz mix) Rosie Gaines "I want you" (Soulmakers mix) Kenny Hawkes "Play the game" David Penn "Sunshine People" Warren Clarke "Love Crazy" Cazibiza "Spinning Around" (Tommyboy mix) David Penn "The Hornes" Michael Gray & Co "Lights Down Low" MTV Vs Red Carpet "Together Alright 2010" Deadmau5 & Chris Lake "I said" (Michael Woods mix) Rank 1 "100" Have faith in what you believe, because some day you might just get it! ;-)
item.dc:creator: Chris Brogan
item.itunes:summary:
Right... Summer is nearly done and dusted. Unfortunately I did not spend it by the beaches of the White Isle this year. I plan to next year.
I have not been to Ibiza in nearly 3 years, guess an appearance needs to be made. In the meantime I've selected some of the best Space Terrace inspired tracks out there at the moment.
Lucky podcast number 13?
Well I hope you enjoy this one as much as I do...
Chris
Ingr-id "Vive Le Swing" (Rivaz mix) Rosie Gaines "I want you" (Soulmakers mix) Kenny Hawkes "Play the game" David Penn "Sunshine People" Warren Clarke "Love Crazy" Cazibiza "Spinning Around" (Tommyboy mix) David Penn "The Hornes" Michael Gray & Co "Lights Down Low" MTV Vs Red Carpet "Together Alright 2010" Deadmau5 & Chris Lake "I said" (Michael Woods mix) Rank 1 "100"
Have faith in what you believe, because some day you might just get it! ;-)

item.title: CRAZE
item.description: Out with anger in with...bass!! It's big, it's dirty, it's not everyone's cup of tea but it's all ME! Tracks carefully selected in case you need to read into it ;-) Big shout out to Joffers and all the team at Recon for such an amazing Fetish Weekend (Don't ask...) Also I would sincerely like to thank from the bottom of my heart Disco Matt for all his support not just for what I've been trying to do but to all the support he gives to DJs across Gay London. Its touching to see that my music is heard with such inspiring ears! Please check his regular updates at: http://discomatt.blogspot.com/ Track listing: Kaskade & Haji - So Far Away Red Carpet - Alright 2010 Florrie - Call 911 (Bart B More mix) Cerronne - Bullit Ou Est Le Swimming Pool - Dance the way I feel (Drill mix) DJ Red Ft The One - Flawless 2010 DJ Rosh - You Got The Love Yves Murasca - Saxophonic Satisfaction Diagram Of The Heart - Dead Famous (Vegas Baby Dub) Adrian Luz - Teenage Crime (Axwell remode) Robyn - Dancing On My Own (Michael Wood mix) Chris Reece - Salvation (Jerome Isma-ae mix)
item.dc:creator: Chris Brogan

Out with anger in with...bass!!
It's big, it's dirty, it's not everyone's cup of tea but it's all ME!
Tracks carefully selected in case you need to read into it ;-)
Big shout out to Joffers and all the team at Recon for such an amazing Fetish Weekend (Don't ask...)
Also I would sincerely like to thank from the bottom of my heart Disco Matt for all his support not just for what I've been trying to do but to all the support he gives to DJs across Gay London. Its touching to see that my music is heard with such inspiring ears!
Please check his regular updates at: http://discomatt.blogspot.com/

item.title: MAN LONDON - GRAND OPENING
item.description: Welcome to London's hottest new concept store. With designs that will blow your Applecrumble and Bitch I bring you my new podcast. Fresh summer beats is just what your Dr ordered. Please come down to the store, view the clothes and listen to some of my exclusive mixes I've done for the shop. You can check out their facebook fan page at: http://www.facebook.com/pages/London-United-Kingdom/MAN-London/356429644314 And mine at: http://www.facebook.com/pages/DJ-Chris-Brogan/398551875456 Dan I owe you! Tracklisting: Casisus - 99 (Modek Rechop) Cookers Ft Roisin Murphy - Royal T (Riva Starr mix) Lissat & Voltax - Its not over Thomas Gold - Everybody Be Somebody (Alex Gomez mix) Uffie - ADD SUV (A V Helden Less of the Hipity Hop mix) Dennis Ferrer Ft Noisettes - HEY HEY (DF Attention mix) Daniel Bovie - Love me (ATFC Mix) Mark Simmond - Soul Love 2010 Olav Baslosic - Snapped David Guetta - Getting Over You Candi Staton - Musical Freedom Kelly Rowland - Commander (Pitron & Sanna mix) Seamus Haji - What We Do (Kiddo Dub) Kelis - Spaceship (EDX mix) PS: HAPPY GLASTONBURY!!!

item.title: Foreplay
item.description: Teasing is pleasing... I'm not one to tease... I just like to please... Track listing: Gramaphonedzie - "Why Don't You" Dj Roland Clark - "Brown James" (Alex Kenji Vocal Dub) Diagram of the Heart - "Dead Famous" (Michael Woods mix) Mark Knight - "Devil Walking" Suzanne Vega - "Tom's Dinner" (Bingo Players mix) (Brogan twicked it edit) Squeeze - "Doop" (Manuel De La Mare mix) Funkerman Ft Ida Corr - "Unconditional Love" (House for all mix) Alex Gold - "Give It Up" (Adam K Soha mix) Marcel Woods - "Music is the answer" Sandy Vee Ft Robin S - "Straight to the sky" (Nicky Romero mix) Kelis - "Acapella" (David Guetta extended mix) Olivier Giacomotto - "Back Down" (Save the robot mix) Lazy Rich- "Blast Off" Cedric Gervais - "Ready Or Not" (EDX mix) Sebastien Drums & Avicii - "My Feelings for you" Enjoy ;-)

item.title: Hola
item.description: Hey Guys Here is a classic mix of great tunes with a hint of sunshine... Summer's only just round the corner! This is a special podcast to give you a little taster of what to expect when I play @ Hola at The Shadow Lounge on May 6th Facebook event: http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=113310442023032&ref=ts Hope to see you all there! Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris Brogan
